remarks: Given an atom less than an element, there is another atom less than the element.  (Contributed by NM, 6-May-2012.)
statement:
2atomslt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
2atomslt.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
2atomslt.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2atlt $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ X e. B ) /\ P .< X ) -> E. q e. A ( q =/= P /\ q .< X ) ) $.
$d .< q $.
$d A q $.
$d B q $.
$d K q $.
$d P q $.
$d X q $.
